descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

mediaFileUri.name: mediaFileUri
mediaFileUri.description: The S3 object location of the input media file
mediaFileUri.ai_hint: The S3 object location of the input media file

detectLanguage.name: detectLanguage
detectLanguage.description: Whether to set this field to true to enable automatic language identification

languageCode.name: languageCode
languageCode.description: Language used in the input media file
languageCode.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

options.name: options
channelIdentification
options.description: Instructs Amazon Transcribe to process each audiochannel separately and then merge the transcription output of each channel into a single transcription. You can't set both Max Speaker Labels and Channel Identification in the same request. If you set both, your request returns a BadRequestException.

options.name: maxAlternatives
options.description: The number of alternative transcriptions that the service should return

options.name: maxSpeakerLabels
options.description: The maximum number of speakers to identify in the input audio. If there are more speakers in the audio than this number, multiple speakers are identified as a single speaker.

options.name: vocabularyName
options.description: Name of vocabulary to use when processing the transcription job

options.name: vocabularyFilterName
options.description: The name of the vocabulary filter to use when transcribing the audio. The filter that you specify must have the same language code as the transcription job.

options.name: vocabularyFilterMethod
options.description:
Set to mask to remove filtered text from the transcript and replace it with three asterisks ("***") as placeholder text.

Set to remove to remove filtered text from the transcript without using placeholder text. Set to tag to mark the word in the transcription output that matches the vocabulary filter. When you set the filter method to tag, the words matching your vocabulary filter are not masked or removed.

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

returnTranscript.name: returnTranscript
returnTranscript.description: By default, the response only contains metadata about the transcript. Enable this option to retrieve the transcript instead.

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

filters.name: filters

options.name: jobNameContains
options.description: Return only transcription jobs whose name contains the specified string

options.name: status
options.description: Return only transcription jobs with the specified status

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'transcriptionJob' AND operation IN ["create", "get", "delete"] THEN SHOW parameter 'transcriptionJobName'
IF resource == 'transcriptionJob' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'mediaFileUri'
IF resource == 'transcriptionJob' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'detectLanguage'
IF resource == 'transcriptionJob' AND operation == 'create' AND detectLanguage == False THEN SHOW parameter 'languageCode'
IF resource == 'transcriptionJob' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnTranscript'
IF resource == 'transcriptionJob' AND operation == 'get' AND returnTranscript == True THEN SHOW parameter 'simple'
IF resource == 'transcriptionJob' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'transcriptionJob' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'transcriptionJob' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
